author: AlberichGamer

text: I played so much DBZ Butouden 2 back then, I remember buying this game (only released in Japan, France and Spain) and being super excited about it. Unfortunately, almost everything about this game is worse than its prequel. Half the content (no story mode?!), half the number of music tracks and a﻿ very lackluster roster. Only the graphics were a step above. This is easily my favorite track in the game.
author: SupraDarky
